vignette.name: Align Objects
vignette.bodytext: There are multiple ways Max can help you align objects.

bluebox.bodytext: Auto Align makes an educated guess as to how to align the selected objects vertically or horizontally. If all objects in the selection are below the top edge of the leftmost object, but not completely to the right of the right edge of the leftmost object, the objects are aligned vertically. Otherwise, they are aligned horizontally.

ul.li: Select the objects you wish to align.
Choose Auto Align (command-Y) from the Arrange menu.

bluebox.bodytext: You can explicity tell Max how you want your selected objects to be aligned.

ul.li: Select the objects you wish to align.
Choose Top from the Align submenu under the Arrange menu.
